CustomField.description: BODEV-2180 Update the table format in Order Form
CustomField.formula:
IF(AND(TEXT(Conga_Show_Package_Discount_Opportunity__c)="Yes",ListPrice >= Default_Price__c,ListPrice >= UnitPrice), ROUND((Quantity * List_Price_ARR_One_off__c),2),
IF(AND(TEXT(Conga_Show_Package_Discount_Opportunity__c)="Yes", Default_Price__c >= ListPrice ,Default_Price__c >= UnitPrice), ROUND((Quantity * Default_Price_ARR__c),2),
IF(AND(TEXT(Conga_Show_Package_Discount_Opportunity__c)="Yes", UnitPrice >= ListPrice ,UnitPrice >= Default_Price__c), ROUND((Quantity * Sales_Price_ARR__c),2),
IF(AND(TEXT(Conga_Show_Package_Discount_Opportunity__c)="No", Default_Price__c >= UnitPrice), ROUND((Quantity * Default_Price_ARR__c),2),
IF(AND(TEXT(Conga_Show_Package_Discount_Opportunity__c)="No", UnitPrice > Default_Price__c), ROUND((Quantity * Sales_Price_ARR__c),2),0 )))))
CustomField.label: Conga Package Subscription MRR/One-off
